title: Blended Learning-Based Competency Enhancement Program for Practical Skills in Social Studies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social science theories and less than one year of practical experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment for in-service professionals to solve social field practical problems, combining face-to-face/online activities with simulation/VR technologies in intensive training

learning_goals: Learners can perform social problem-solving scenarios with over 80% accuracy using simulation/VR tools in blended learning environments.
Learners can complete project-based assignments by exchanging feedback with peers at least three times via online collaboration tools.
Learners can write a self-reflection report evaluating the effectiveness of blended learning components (face-to-face/online/simulation).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
